original_text: The Israelite people ate the Passover meal on the evening of the 14th day of that month. They did this while they were at Gilgal, near Jericho city.
korean_text: 또 이스라엘 자손들이 길갈에 진 쳤고 그 달 십사일 저녁에는 여리고 평지에서 유월절을 지켰으며

sentences.original_text: The Israelite people ate the Passover meal
on the evening of the 14th day of that month
They did this while they were at Gilgal
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 길갈에 있을 때 이렇게 했다
